products.description: Inspired by Michael Jordan's alma mater, the Off-White x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'UNC'.
The Air Jordan 4 Infrared features a tonal grey Durabuck upper with black TPU mesh inserts, tech straps, and heel tabs.

products.productName: Travis Scott x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Mocha'
products.description: The Travis Scott x Air Jordan 1 Retro High features a new look on the iconic silhouette, thanks to an oversized backward-facing Swoosh on the lateral side.
This pair is dressed in a New Emerald, White, and Light Steel Grey color scheme.

The 2021 edition of the Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Lightning' resurrects a highly coveted colorway that originally launched in 2006 alongside an accompanying 'Thunder' colorway, both of which were inspired by Michael Jordan's Motorsports team.

products.productName: OFF WHITE x NIKE DUNK LOW LOT 26
products.description: The Nike Dunk Low 'Black White' treats the retro model to an essential two-tone color scheme that accentuates the sneaker's clean lines, developed by designer Peter Moore and responsible for the shoe's easy transition from the hardwood to the street.

products.productName: Nike Dunk High Ambush Deep Royal Blue
products.description: Designed in partnership with the Tokyo-based brand helmed by Yoon Ahn, the AMBUSH x Nike Dunk High 'Deep Royal' delivers a stylized take on the vintage silhouette.

products.productName: UNION LA x AIR JORDAN 4 OFF NOIR
products.details: OFF NOIR/BRIGADE BLUE/DARK SMOKE GREY/LIGHT FUSION RED
products.description: The Union LA x Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Off Noir' represents the follow-up effort to the duo's highly coveted Air Jordan 1 collaboration from 2018.
